actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations on securities.

summary.text: Small Investors Act - Provides a limited exclusion of up to $1,000 under the Internal Revenue Code for the excess amount of long-term capital gain over short-term capital loss realized by taxpayers other than corporations on the sale or exchange of securities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a limited exclusion of capital gains realized by taxpayers other than corporations on securities.
